job.title: Electromechanical Assembler
job.description:
What does the day-to-day look like in this role?:
Assemble world class production systems
Support the engineers designing the systems

Must-have qualifications::
Work experience in a similar position
Good technical acumen and ability to read drawings
Communication skills in Estonian and English
Estonian work permit

Nice-to-have qualifications::
Good computer skills, experience using ERP/CAD software
Ability to use hand and power tools
Self-discipline and orientation to teamwork

What's in it for you?:
You can accelerate your career and enjoy professional growth opportunities
You will get employer health insurance and sports compensation
We organize regular team events and company Summer Days that foster camaraderie, collaboration, and fun outside of the workplace
